question: In which year Sikandar Lodi transferred his capital from Delhi to Agra?
explanation: To conquer the Gwalior Fort, Sikandar Lodi established the city of Agra in 1503 AD and in 1506 AD, he transferred his capital from Delhi to Agra. Though, till his death he was not able to capture the Gwalior fort. Agra was known as Shiraz of India during his time.
